"Wand":
"A Wand is a melee weapon that creates an Attribute-based \"Tech Explosion\" when you strike an enemy with it.

By making full use of Techniques, you will be able to adapt to a wide range of situations that may call for Physical Downs, as well as Attribute Downs."
"The Wand's true value shows itself when you learn the Class Skill \"Wand Element Change\", which lets you switch your weapon's Attribute in the middle of battle."

"The PA \"Rapid Smash\" lets you close in on a single enemy and deal high damage do them.

Charging the PA turns it into a more powerful attack."
